sources.title: Bridge Ahoy! (1936)
sources.description: Popeye and Olive are taking a ferry run by Bluto. When they find out the fare, they decide, with Wimpy, to build a bridge. Bluto does what he can to sabotage this plan - until spinach time, of course. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bridge-ahoy-1936/

metadata.Plot: Fed up with Bluto's greed with his expensive river ferry service, Popeye, Olive and Wimpy decide to undermine the bully by building a bridge instead.
metadata.Actors: Lou Fleischer, Jack Mercer, Mae Questel
